name: Basic Bird
description: once per turn: cannot be fired

name: Night Shift Bird
description: earn 1 pt when hired. If on the field, return to hand during end phase.

name: Desperate Bird
description: does not require payment

name: Reception Bird
description: when hired, you can consult another penguin that costs 1 or less pts

name: Internship
description: reduce the cost of placing a penguin by 1

name: Dismissal
description: fire a 0pt penguin

name: Lunch break
description: prevent the activation of a spell

name: Coffee pot refill
description: draw 2 cards

name: Career fair
description: shuffle a penguin from trash into the deck

name: Bad fit
description: prevent a 0pt penguin from being hired

name: Cubicle
description: every adjacent penguin earns 1 extra pt. If more than one penguin is adjacent, destroy this card.

name: Number 2 pencil
description: earn 2 points per turn if at least one penguin is adjacent to this card

name: Access Bird
description: once per turn: you can move this card

name: Startup Bird
description: if placed adjacent to another penguin, gain 2 pts when hired

name: Eureka Bird
description: once per turn: you may pay 1 pt to add one item from your trash to your hand

name: Fishbook Pro
description: once per turn: you can consult a penguin to a space adjacent to this card

name: Search Engine
description: add 1 penguin from your deck to your hand

name: Sois Bird ("sue chef")
description: once per turn: if this penguin is adjacent to a restaurant, earn 1 pt for every non-Food penguin adjacent to that restaraunt

name: Spicy Dish
description: destroy a restaurant and fire any adjacent penguins

name: Sweet Dish
description: choose 1 restaurant. the controllers of adjacent penguins earn 1 pt for each penguin.

name: 5 star review
description: move a penguin on the field to a space adjacent to a Restaraunt
